name: Untitled Nurse Game
description:
(web build is broken, I suggest playing the .exe file instead)

Rowdy students are getting themselves injured. As the school nurse, it is your job to go after them and tend to the injured. A life will lose if its to late.

Use the right equipment on the appropriate symptoms:

  • Wound => Bandage
  • Headache => Painkillers
  • Bruise => Ice pack

Sometimes effects shows up, hindering progress. Deal with them to continue aid:

  • Dehydration (drought) => Water bottle
  • Low Heart Rate => CPR
Controls: Walking:
  • Arrow Keys = Movement
  • Z = Heal (when close to an injured student)
  • Shift => Short boost in speed
  • Esc = Return to main menu

Healing:

  • Left and right arrow keys = Selecting options
  • Up arrow key = Use tool
